thread.title: Torino boss Mihajlovic calls Maxi Lopez a 'f g dog' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Torino boss Mihajlovic calls Maxi Lopez a 'f g dog' | Daily Mail Online

author: Glen Williams For Mailonline
title: Torino boss Mihajlovic calls Maxi Lopez a 'f g dog' | Daily Mail Online
text: 2014–2015 Chievo 2015– Torino 'The qualities of Maxi have never been questioned,' Mihajlovic said. 'I'm happy with his goal, but I am also angry. 'If we had him a few weeks ago in these conditions, he could make us comfortable. As soon as he went from 99 kilos down to 94.5, he scored. 'He first should be angry with himself: he has thrown away a year like this, the f g dog.' There is no doubting the forward's pedigree. His talents were spotted while plying his trade in Argentina for River Plate and he was brought to Barcelona by Frank Rijkard as a 20-year-old in 2005. But after failing to break through a the Nou Camp, Lopez began his journeyman career through Europe, turning out for the likes of Moscow and Milan before landing in Turin two years ago. Lopez failed to break through the ranks at the Nou Camp and then began his nomadic career RELATED ARTICLES
